subject: JUnit Books
msgSnippet: Is anyone aware of any book projects currently underway focusing specifically on JUnit, and possibly also addressing integration with Ant, Cactus,
messageBody:
Is anyone aware of any book projects currently underway focusing
specifically on JUnit, and possibly also addressing integration with
Ant, Cactus, CruiseControl, etc.? I'm aware that Wiley has one book
currently available.

Thanks in advance.

Mike
